nodes.text: Dreffon IV was an astronomical object located in the Colonies' Dreffon system. The distance between Dreffon IV and the Outer Rim Territories' Dravian Starport could be traversed in sixteen days using a starship equipped with a Class 1 hyperdrive.
During the Galactic Civil War, the Dravian Starport–based shipping company Jontz Freight offered free-traders a job of transporting ten tons of plasmaberries to Dreffon IV for 1,600 credits.

Dreffon IV was mentioned in "Tales of the Smoking Blaster," a roleplaying game adventure written by Bill Smith. The adventure was included in Star Wars Gamemaster Handbook, a 1993 sourcebook published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Dreffon system, and therefore Dreffon IV, in grid square J-9.
